translationText: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.

arabicText: وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لِلَّهِ إِن كُنتُمْ إِيَّاهُ تَعْبُدُونَ
translationText: And be grateful to Allah if it is Him that you worship.
And few of My servants are truly grateful.

arabicText: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَـٰلًۭا طَيِّبًۭا ۙ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ
translationText: So eat of what Allah has provided for you, lawful and good, and be grateful for the favor of Allah.

arabicText: ٱعْمَلُوٓا۟ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكْرًۭا ۚ وَقَلِيلٌۭ مِّنْ عِبَادِىَ ٱلشَّكُورُ
translationText: Work, O family of David, in gratitude. And few of My servants are grateful.

arabicText: وَٱللَّهُ أَخْرَجَكُم مِّنۢ بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
translationText: And Allah brought you out of the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and gave you hearing and sight and hearts that you might be grateful.

arabicText: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَسْمَعُونَ
translationText: Indeed in that are signs for a people who listen.
So remind, if the reminder should benefit.

arabicText: كُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِ رَبِّكُمْ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لَهُۥ ۖ بَلْدَةٌۭ طَيِّبَةٌۭ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٌۭ
translationText: Eat from the provision of your Lord and be grateful to Him. A good land and a forgiving Lord.
And Allah will reward the grateful.
Indeed, he was a grateful servant.

arabicText: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ
translationText: If you disbelieve, indeed Allah is free of need of you. But if you are grateful, He is pleased with it for you.
